en.name: swarm.city
en.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City is a decentralized commerce platform.
en.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Enabled by the SWT token, running on the Ethereum blockchain
en.Locally on your device no central databa: locally on your device, no central database
en.Its an open source project so you can ju: It's an open source project, so you can jump right in
en.No account was found: No account was found. When you restore or create a new account, it's stored locally on your device.
en.Can we ask for your location: Can we ask for your location?
en.When accepting your browser will ask you: When accepting your browser will ask you to enable location services
en.How do you want to restore your account: How do you want to restore your account?
en.Do you want to stop creating your accoun: Do you want to stop creating your account?
en.This can not be undone. All progress wil: This can not be undone. All progress will be lost
en.Scroll to zoom - drag to move: Scroll to zoom - drag to move
en.The next step is choosing a password. Ch: The next step is choosing a password. Choose a password with care.
en.There is no password recovery available: There is no password recovery available in Swarm City.
en.You now have a Swarm City account: You now have a Swarm City account
en.There are no central servers on which ac: There are no central servers on which accounts are stored.
en.This means you are responsible for your: This means you are responsible for your own account at all times.
en.Your backup is encrypted with your passw: Your backup is encrypted with your password.
en.Email the account file to yourself or ch: Email the account file to yourself or choose the download option to start a direct download.
en.Be careful in displaying your private ke: Be careful in displaying your private key. It's the only thing needed to steal your funds.
en.Your account file combined with your pas: Your account file combined with your password will always give you access to your SWT balance.

cn.name: 一群市
cn.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: 一群市是一个分散的商业平台
cn.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: 由在以太坊块链上运行的SWT令牌启用
cn.Locally on your device no central databa: 您的设备中无本地中央数据库
cn.Its an open source project so you can ju: 这是一个开源项目，所以每个人都可以帮助建立
cn.No account was found: 没有找到帐户。恢复或创建新帐户时，将其存储在本地设备上。
cn.Can we ask for your location: 我们可以要求您的位置吗
cn.When accepting your browser will ask you: 接受浏览器时会要求您启用位置服务

fr.No account was found: Aucun compte trouvé. Lorsque vous restaurez ou créez un nouveau compte, il est stocké localement sur votre machine.
fr.Its an open source project so you can ju: C'est un projet Open Source auquel vous pouvez participer
fr.Locally on your device no central databa: localement sur votre machine, pas de base de donnée centralisée
fr.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Permis par le jeton SWT, fonctionnant sur la blockchain Ethereum
fr.How do you want to restore your account: Comment souhaitez vous restaurer votre compte ?
fr.When accepting your browser will ask you: Une fois acceptée, votre navigateur vous demandera d'activer les services de géolocalisation
fr.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City est une plate-forme de commerce décentralisée
fr.name: swarm.city

nl.No account was found: Er werd geen account gevonden. Maak een nieuw account aan of laadt een bestaand account op. Het wordt dan lokaal opgeslagen op uw toestel.
nl.Its an open source project so you can ju: HEt is een opens source project, iedereen is welkom om samen te werken
nl.Locally on your device no central databa: draait op je toestel, geen centrale database
nl.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Mogelijk gemaakt door SWT tokens, draait op de Ethereum blockchain
nl.How do you want to restore your account: Hoe wil je je account  herinstellen?
nl.When accepting your browser will ask you: Wanneer je accepteert, vraagt je browser om de locatie service te ontgrendelen
nl.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City is een decentraal handelsplatform
nl.name: swarm.city

de.No account was found: Es wurde kein Konto gefunden. Wenn ein neues Konto erstellt oder ein bestehendes Konto wiederhergestellt wird, werden die Informationen auf deinem Gerät gespeichert.
de.Its an open source project so you can ju: Es ist ein quelloffenes Projekt. Du kannst also sofort starten.
de.Locally on your device no central databa: lokal auf deinem Gerät, keine zentrale Datenbank.
de.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Ermöglicht durch das SWT-Token, betrieben durch die Ethereum-Blockchain
de.How do you want to restore your account: Wie willst du dein Konto wiederherstellen
de.When accepting your browser will ask you: Nach der Akzeptierung wird der Browser fragen ob die Standort-Dienste aktiviert werden sollen.
de.Can we ask for your location: Dürfen wir nach deinem Standort fragen?
de.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City ist eine dezentralisierte Handelsplattform
de.name: swarm.city

pl.No account was found: Nie znaleziono konta. Kiedy przywracasz istniejące lub tworzysz nowe konto, jest ono zapisywane lokalnie na Twoim urządzeniu.
pl.Its an open source project so you can ju: Projekt open source - dołącz już dziś!
pl.Locally on your device no central databa: lokalnie na Twoim urządzeniu, bez centralnej bazy danych
pl.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Działa dzięki tokenom SWT, opartym na Ethereum.
pl.When accepting your browser will ask you: Akceptując, zostaniesz poproszony o włączenie usług lokalizacyjnych.
pl.Swarm City is a decentralized commerce p: Swarm City jest zdecentralizowaną platformą sprzedażową.
pl.name: swarm.city

tr.Enabled by the SWT token running on the: Ethereum blok zincirinde çalışan SWT tokenı tarafından etkinleştirildi
